name: LPMD_S_XML_HFI_SUV_ENABLE
summary: Verify change default xml configuration to enable HFI suvivability power mode by setting 1 in <HfiSuvEnable>0</HfiSuvEnable>, to perform low power mode force enter, force exit, auto enter lpm, survivability mode enter, survivability mode exit and terminate, verify if all the activity patterns are correct from debug logs
